claim: The final themes were presented in Figure 1.
title: Figure 1.
caption: Final theme map derived from the interviews.

claim: The frequencies with which individuals made spontaneous references to suicide attempts were characterized by gender and the PRS score (Figure 2).
title: Figure 2.
caption: Frequency of references to suicide attempts by participant characteristics PRS group indicates the grouping according to scores rated on the pain resilience scale. Suicide = 0 indicates no suicide attempt; Suicide = 1 indicates with suicide attempt. Opioid = 0 indicates no use of opioid for pain control; and Opioid = 1 indicates the use of prescription opioid as a method of pain control.
